txt.en: Lore-singer Arzhur is satisfied that the drake egg you brought to him will suffice as the token of honour required to meet the rival clan's challenge.

'Now we must take the egg you found to Aidan, our clan champion, who awaits it at Fail-치-Khro north-east of Aughaire.

'I am afraid we must ask you for another boon, friend from the south. Aidan is a strong fighter, but he is the last such of whom our clan can boast. We have many bold hunters, skilful hearth-keepers, and perhaps even a few wise lore-singers, but of warriors we have few; our foes have been biting away at our strength like dogs worrying a bone.

'The challenge Aidan must face is not a single combat. I ask that you fight by his side, for the honour of our clan, no less than for its survival.'

Aidan is waiting at Fail-치-Khro to the north-east of Aughaire.\n\nLore-singer Arzhur has asked you to take the drake's egg to Aidan and then to fight by his side against the challengers from the clans loyal to Angmar.
'You have done well, Southron. But the rival clans have more trouble for us.'
Aidan is at Fail-치-Khro north-east of Aughaire.\n\nFight alongside Aidan against the challengers from a hostile clan loyal to Angmar.
Arzhur is at Aughaire, south-west of Fail-치-Khro.\n\nYou should return to Arzhur and report of your victory against the first challenge.
'Take the egg to Aidan and fight by his side against the challengers from the other clans.'
'Now it is time to fight. Let us see who comes against us!'
'Good. I thought no one would come with that egg. But you are to fight at my side? I do not know....\n\n'Well, needs must. I hope you are stronger than you look, Southron!'
'Why do you come to this place, Southron?'
Bring the drake's egg to Aidan
Speak with Aidan when you are ready to fight by his side.
